ygData.subject: RE: RE: Correction to Blued 2handed hammer [Spoiler]
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny - I was bored and passing through Lake Rathe and heard someone saying they could see Webclaw........... ... From:	Chris Musson
ygData.messageBody:
Funny - I was bored and passing through Lake Rathe and heard someone saying
they could see Webclaw...........<scroll down>

-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Musson
[mailto:oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...]
Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 8:35 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Correction to Blued 2handed
hammer [Spoiler]

From: Chris Musson <oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...>

;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;

He spawns way back in a cove "near Jonas the hermits cabin" - I followed a
loc someone shouted - its past the barbies and pretty far back in a deep
cove.

Ok - so I can see him and he cons blue to me at 30. I call for my 26 ranger
friend who is in zone to come help. Some one said dispell him and he is no
problem - well ok but I don't got a song for that. So, I buff us and played
guardian rythmns. The ranger gave us enduring breath. Webbie is a nasty
caster and burned the hell out of my ranger pal - he died infact. Now its
me and webbie about half and half in health. I am just not getting hits on
him trying to melee in the water. The only damage song I got loaded is
Bellow - so I apply it liberally and this does him in. I finished the fight
with less that a bub of hp left. Very close call. With 20-20 hind sight, I
can see that there is a green crock swimming nearby which would have been
death if he got into the melee (if I had used AE chords for example)

Got the watercrystal staff 5dam/28dly wt 6. I am back to trying to raise my
1HB - average now <sigh> all you young bards - max all of your skills - all
the way up - you will be glad you did!

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 30th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


>Hmmm, I thought (heard rumor) that you had to attack an
underwater goblin
>and pull him out of the water (and then zone because he was
a deep red) -
>and that would trigger Webclaw to spawn outside of the
water at the base of
>the Fire Tower.
I had never heard that. I have been there several times,
and Webclaw has been
there 90% of the time (no triggers needed) and the other 10%
were placeholders.
(The placeholder is Green to Webclaw, or damn close to it)

I apologize for the thing about having to fight him
underwater, but watching my
friend fight him (lvl 34 druid) he could not pull him out of
the water. he
tried 3 times and all three times he 32K'd. so, he just
killed him underwater
and had no problems. I know the Underwater AI has some
*Issues* so maybe he
was just doing things in a way that it didn't like.

I live to live,

Kaleid
20th Song
Wave of the Dark Tide
Prexus
